This summer’s overpriced hotels, flights and Airbnb’s will be brought to you by Johnson & Johnson, Pfizer and Moderna

nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:

nodes.title:
If you have $1 million you're in the top 1% of ppl worldwide

12% of ppl have $100k or more

And more than half of the world's population has less than $10k to their name

The Best Time to Give Back

https://t.co/SLq0lIAPHO https://t.co/kHS9m7RN5t
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
如果你有100万美金，你就是世界上最有钱的1%的人了

12%的人拥有10万或更多

而世界上有超过一半的人口名下只有不到一万块钱。

回馈社会的最佳时机

https://t.co/SLq0lIAPHO https://t.co/kHS9m7RN5t

如果你有100萬美金，你就是世界上最有錢的1%的人了

12%的人擁有10萬或更多

而世界上有超過一半的人口名下只有不到一萬塊錢。

回饋社會的最佳時機

https://t.co/SLq0lIAPHO https://t.co/kHS9m7RN5t

nodes.title: “This is not ideal for us and it’s not a new normal,” Goldman Sachs' CEO said about working remotely. “I am very focused on the fact that I don’t want another class of young people arriving at Goldman Sachs in the summer remotely."  https://t.co/LLfaWShzTZ
nodes.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text: "这对我们来说并不理想，也不是一种新的常态。"高盛的CEO在谈到远程工作时说。"我非常注重的是，我不希望夏天又有一类年轻人远程抵达高盛。" https://t.co/LLfaWShzTZ。
"這對我們來說並不理想，也不是一種新的常態。"高盛的CEO在談到遠程工作時說。"我非常注重的是，我不希望夏天又有一類年輕人遠程抵達高盛。" https://t.co/LLfaWShzTZ。

nodes.title:
Something I’m workshopping as a potential marker cycle:

Interest rates rise —> stocks sell off —> pensions/insurers/retirees buy bonds that now have higher yields —> yields fall —> stocks rise —> repeat
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
我正在研讨一个潜在的标记周期的东西。

利率上升-> 股票抛售-> 养老金/保险公司/退休人员购买债券，现在有更高的收益率-> 收益率下降-> 股票上涨-> 重复。

我正在研討一個潛在的標記週期的東西。

利率上升-> 股票拋售-> 養老金/保險公司/退休人員購買債券，現在有更高的收益率-> 收益率下降-> 股票上漲-> 重複。

nodes.title: "It’s really stupid to have a culture which encourages [so] much gambling in stocks by people who have the mindset of racetrack bettors and, of course, it will create trouble, as it did," Charlie Munger said. https://t.co/Ly5YNTew8K
nodes.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text: "如果有一种文化，鼓励[如此]具有赛马场赌徒心态的人在股票上进行赌博，那真的很愚蠢，当然，它会制造麻烦，就像它一样，"查理-芒格说。https://t.co/Ly5YNTew8K。
"如果有一種文化，鼓勵[如此]具有賽馬場賭徒心態的人在股票上進行賭博，那真的很愚蠢，當然，它會製造麻煩，就像它一樣，"查理-芒格說。https://t.co/Ly5YNTew8K。

The surge in US inflation expectations continues unabated, now at its highest level in over 8 years (2.38%)...
